titles.title: A resolution designating the week of May 1 through May 7, 2018, as "National Physical Education and Sport Week".
A resolution designating the week of May 1 through May 7, 2018, as "National Physical Education and Sport Week".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
Designates the week of May 1-May 7, 2018, as National Physical Education and Sport Week.
Encourages school districts to implement physical education programs and classes.
